description: Creates an IoT software package that can be deployed to your fleet. Requires permission to access the CreatePackage and GetIndexingConfiguration actions.

parameters.name: packageName
parameters.description: The name of the new software package.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Metadata that can be used to manage the package. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique case-sensitive identifier that you can provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. Don't reuse this client token if a new idempotent request is required. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: packageName
nested_items.description: The name of the software package.

nested_items.name: packageArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the package.
